response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and the benefits it provides, I believe we can reach an agreement that is mutually beneficial. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $9,500. This price reflects the quality of the product and the value it brings to you, while also ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.
